page.title: 09MOTOR CROSS ON THE DOWNS
page.content: {Motor Cross}is a sport for motor cycle enthusiasts. It is a modern sport, and the cycles are specially adapted for rough riding. The course is set on a steep slope, unsuitable for cultivation near the Bridleway{M.R. {253087.}The farmer and the local Authority have given permission. Racing takes place mostly at the weekend and the riders race around a continuous circuit on the steep hillside. Some people complain about the noise and dust, others complain about the ugly scar on the Downs which is visible for miles. The enthusiasts, who come from all over S.E. England, enjoy the speed and thrills of the racing and most people feel that it keeps them off the roads, which would be more dangerous. So{Motor Cross}is allowed to continue at the moment.
